fields.label: Accent Color 2
fields.name: accent_color_2
fields.instructions: Secondary color accent. Used for button gradients in combination with the accent color 1

fields.label: Accent Color 3
fields.name: accent_color_3
fields.instructions: Lightest color accent. Best used for overlays, boxed backgrounds and image background placeholders

fields.label: Button Look
fields.name: button_look
fields.instructions: Select a button look which will be applied sitewide

fields.label: Custom Button Colors
fields.message: Site buttons already have their default styling taken from the accent colors above. You can further customize them using the fields below

fields.label: Solid Gradient Hover
fields.name: solid_gradient_hover
fields.instructions: Solid button by default. Gradient when hovered

fields.label: Gradient Button
fields.name: gradient_button
fields.instructions: Gradient background color by default. No changes when hovered

fields.label: Outline Button
fields.name: outline_button
fields.instructions: Transparent bordered button to solid when hovered

fields.label: Header Logo Light
fields.name: header_logo_light
fields.instructions: This version will be used if a post/page chooses the Light Header Type

fields.label: Footer Background Color
fields.name: footer_background_color
fields.instructions: If empty, defaults to accent color 1

fields.label: Footer Background Image
fields.name: footer_background_image
fields.instructions: The Footer background image must have an overlay so the text will be readable. Uses the footer background color as an overlay if present otherwise defaults to accent color 1.

sub_fields.label: Menu Name
sub_fields.name: menu_name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of the menu you want to add in which can be found under Appearance -> Menus on the left sidebar

sub_fields.label: Reverse Form
sub_fields.name: reverse_form
sub_fields.instructions: Switch column position. If yes, form will be on the left and data on the right.

sub_fields.label: Show Social Media Links
sub_fields.name: show_social_media_links
sub_fields.instructions: Update social links in general site data

sub_fields.label: Reverse Copyright
sub_fields.name: reverse_copyright
sub_fields.instructions: Switch column position. If yes, social media icons will be on the left and copyright on the right.
